TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMobileWebFormServices

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

Docs.summary: Defines an interface for a page designer component to obtain services from a designer host such as Visual Studio 2005 at design time. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks All methods in this interface are to be implemented by the design host and made available to designer components through this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.IMobileWebFormServices> interface. Before attempting to use the methods in a custom designer component, verify that the design host actually implements the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ClearUndoStack ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ClearUndoStack() cil managed
Public Sub ClearUndoStack ()
public: void ClearUndoStack();

Docs.summary: Clears all items in the designer host's **Undo** cache at design time. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Since the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.IMobileWebFormServices.ClearUndoStack%2A> method is implemented by the designer host, verify that it exists before invoking it.

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetCache (string controlID, object key);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetCache(string controlID, object key) cil managed
Public Function GetCache (controlID As String, key As Object) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetCache(System::String ^ controlID, System::Object ^ key);

Docs.param: The ID for the container control.
The key for the cache item.
Docs.summary: Gets an item from the cache of the designer host at design time. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Docs.returns: An object from the cache of the designer host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Since the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.IMobileWebFormServices.GetCache%2A> method is implemented by the designer host, verify that it exists before invoking it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Since the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.IMobileWebFormServices.RefreshPageView%2A> method is implemented by the designer host, verify that it exists before invoking it.

Public Sub UpdateRenderingRecursive (rootControl As Control)
public: void UpdateRenderingRecursive(System::Web::UI::Control ^ rootControl);

Docs.param: The container control with which to begin the update.
Docs.summary: Recursively updates the associated control and each of its child controls in the design host at design time. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
